<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Charau-ka Acolyte of Angazhan](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1431)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Even with the Gorilla King's fall, many charau-ka still worship the terrible might of the god [Angazhan](/Deities.aspx?ID=72). The strongest of these acolytes guard the steps of the High Throne in Usaro, ensuring that no one without Angazhan's favor or suitable physical prowess can approach the top of the massive stone step pyramid. 

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Humanoid](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14)): DC 18

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 16

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 13
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">

</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 3">[Charau-ka Acolyte of Angazhan](/Monsters.aspx?ID=1431)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="LE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Small" />
<trait label="Charau-ka" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=263" />
<trait label="Humanoid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=91" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [The Mwangi Expanse](/Sources.aspx?ID=89) pg. 297 <sup>2.0</sup>, [Pathfinder #146: Cult of Cinders](/Sources.aspx?ID=7) pg. 85</row>

**Perception** +8; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12), [scent](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=33) (imprecise) 30 feet

**Languages**
[Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Draconic](/Languages.aspx?ID=2), [Mwangi](/Languages.aspx?ID=39)

**Skills**
[Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +7, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +7, [Nature](/Skills.aspx?ID=10) +9, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +11, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +7

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +2

**Dex** +2

**Con** +1

**Int** +0

**Wis** +4

**Cha** +2
</row>

**Items**
[Hide Armor](/Armor.aspx?ID=7), [Spear](/Weapons.aspx?ID=10)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 19 

**Fort** +8 

**Ref** +7 

**Will** +11 

</row>

**HP** 45

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 25 feet, climb 25 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
spear +10 ([thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+5 piercing

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
fist +10 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188)),
**Damage** 1d4+5 bludgeoning

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
spear +10 ([deadly d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+5 piercing

**Ranged**
<actions string="Single Action" />
thrown debris +10 ([deadly d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174), [thrown 20 feet](/Traits.aspx?ID=195)),
**Damage** 1d6+5 bludgeoning

**Divine Prepared Spells** DC 17, attack +11
- **Cantrips (2nd)**
[Daze](/Spells.aspx?ID=61), [Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84), [Guidance](/Spells.aspx?ID=142), [Message](/Spells.aspx?ID=190)
- **1st**
[Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Heal](/Spells.aspx?ID=148), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244)
- **2nd**
[Entangle](/Spells.aspx?ID=103), [Sound Burst](/Spells.aspx?ID=292)

**Shrieking Frenzy** <actions string="Free Action" /> ([Primal](/Traits.aspx?ID=134), [Transmutation](/Traits.aspx?ID=157)) **Frequency** once per hour; **Trigger** The charau-ka's turn begins; **Effect** The charau-ka is [quickened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=32) until the end of their turn and can use the extra action only to Stride or Strike. While in the frenzy, the charau-ka can't speak and automatically critically fails [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) checks, due to their loud wailing.

**Thrown Weapon Mastery**   Any weapon a charau-ka throws gains the [deadly d6](/Traits.aspx?ID=174) weapon trait. Furthermore, when a charau-ka throws an improvised weapon, they do not take the –2 penalty for doing so, nor does they take a penalty for using a thrown improvised weapon with the [nonlethal](/Traits.aspx?ID=188) trait to make a lethal attack.

</column>
